name: David
text: I had this problem.  I found if I unplugged the wired network from the router then all the wireless devices connected fine.  If I plugged in the wired network then some wireless devices worked and other didn't.  I diagnosed it by unplugging everything on the lan and re-connecting them one at a time, until I found that I had put the network in the wrong socket on my FON wireless access point.  I plugged it in where it said "internet" not where it said "computer", and all was well.
